element.name: rptotal
element.sql: SELECT pos.number term, DATE_FORMAT(mo.date, '%d.%m.%y %H::%i::%S') shiftdate, mo.amount total FROM ukmserver.trm_out_moneyoperation mo INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos pos ON pos.cash_id = mo.cash_id WHERE mo.date >= :pFrom AND mo.date <= :pTo AND pos.store_id = :pstore ORDER BY pos.number, mo.date
